main event: A radar track of an unidentified object was detected over Indian Springs and Las Vegas, Nevada on September 20, 1960.
interesting points: The radar return was solid, strong, and constant, indicating a solid object.
The object remained at a constant altitude and did not change speed or direction during the 1.5 minute observation.
The object was not picked up on any other radar sets in the area.
There have been numerous similar sightings reported in the Las Vegas area over the past few months.
A retired U.S. Air Force captain reported seeing 10-15 disc-shaped, white objects traveling at fantastic speeds in the sky on September 8th.
location: Indian Springs and Las Vegas, Nevada
